short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps with maintaining order within once opened and never-seen-again tabs as well with those visited way too often.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hundreds of opened tabs? Dozens of useless duplicate tabs with opened emails, google searches, your favourite social networks and articles you wanted to read a month ago? Let's clean the mess!

Clean the mess! a simple addon that is designed to help you with maintaining order among opened websites and (re)gaining your control over them. Unlike some other extensions, first and main purpose of Clean the mess! is to help you find and mercilessly close tabs you don't need, not just reorder them.

With its integrated search feature, Clean the mess! could also be used as a fast and simple tab manager, that lets you find whatever tabs you might be looking for and close them one by one or all of them altogether finally at once.
